Installing

There are two ways to install . To model, develop, or test business networks, install the Playground locally or use the playground online.

If you want to develop and test applications, connect to a running instance, or run and locally, see installing .

If you want a more guided “Getting Started” experience, see our Tutorials and Getting Started guides.

After installing, create a connection profile to connect to a running instance. See creating a connection profile
